channel.title: Events on Krita Site
channel.description: Recent content in Events on Krita Site

item.title: Four Seasons of Leon and Kiki: a Drawing Contest
item.description: Contest Leon and Kiki are exploring their artistic path. By coincidence, Leon and Kiki met and traveled the art world together.

item.title: Voting for the Kickstarter stretch goals
item.description: Every 15-euro-and-up backer gets 5 votes to distribute between their favourite stretch goals. All stretch goals on the list are attainable (as you may have heard we’re more than 10.

item.title: How to Back a KickStarter
item.description: Step 1: Back the KickStarter Page Kickstarter only has an English website, so all screenshots will be in English. If you use Google Chrome, you might be able to right click on the pages and click “Translate to xxx”.
